text: Hello all, on our blog pages we do not have access to the modules in the content section of the template. Please is there a way to resolve this as I intend on adding a custom module to blog posts. Thank you.

The blog listings template currently allows drag-and-drop but unfortunately I don't believe the blog post template allows it yet (though I think it's in planning).

You can still add custom modules or custom fields to the blog post template itself, depending on what you're trying to do. Fields I've found to be handy as you can still access that data if you ever swap out the blog post, or to pull it into the blog listings.

I wrote a post on using fields in blog posts that may or may not be helpful: <https://www.stephanieogaygarcia.com/HubSpot-website-development/adding-custom-fields-to-HubSpot-blog-posts>
